short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Retro Bowl Classic is an American-style football game! Have fun!

short.cs: Retro Bowl Classic je americká hra ve stylu amerického fotbalu! Bavte se!

short.fi: Retro Bowl Classic on amerikkalaistyylinen jalkapallopeli! Pitäkää hauskaa!

short.he,no: ¡Retro Bowl Classic es un juego de fútbol americano de estilo americano! ¡Diviértete!

short.id: Retro Bowl Classic adalah permainan sepak bola gaya Amerika! Selamat bersenang-senang!
short.ja: Retro Bowl Classicはアメリカンフットボールのゲームです！楽しんでください！
short.ko: 레트로 볼 클래식은 미국식 축구 게임입니다! 즐기세요!

short.nl: Retro Bowl Classic is een American-style football spel! Veel plezier!
short.pl: ريترو بول كلاسيك هي لعبة كرة القدم الأمريكية! استمتع!
short.ro: Retro Bowl Classic este un joc de fotbal de stil american! Distrează-te!

short.sl: Retro Bowl Classic je ameriška igra ameriškega nogometa! Uživajte!
short.sr: Ретро Боул Класик је америчка игра у стилу америчког фудбала! Уживај!

short.th: รีเทร์โรบาวคลาสสิกเป็นเกมฟุตบอลสไตล์อเมริกัน! สนุกนะครับ!
short.tr: Retro Bowl Klasik bir Amerikan futbolu oyunudur! İyi eğlenceler!
short.uk: Ретро Боул Класік - це американська гра у футбол! Весело провести час!
short.zh_CN: Retro Bowl Classic是一款美式橄榄球游戏！玩得开心！
short.zh_TW: Retro Bowl Classic 是一款美式足球遊戲！玩得開心！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏈 Retro Bowl Classic - Touchdowns in a Timeless Era! 🌟

Relive the glory days of football with Retro Bowl Classic - the iconic gridiron experience, now available for FREE on the Chrome Web Store! 🆓🌐

🌟 Nostalgic Features:

🏆 Build your dream team and lead them to championship glory!
🎮 Experience retro-inspired graphics and immersive gameplay!
🌈 Strategize plays, manage your roster, and conquer the league!
🎉 Immerse yourself in the classic football atmosphere with a modern twist!
🚀 Why Opt for Retro Bowl Classic?
Step into the shoes of a football legend and dominate the field in this timeless and nostalgic gridiron classic! 🏈🌟

🕹️ How to Play:

🌍 Install Retro Bowl Classic from the Chrome Web Store.
🏆 Build your team, call plays, and lead them to victory.
🌟 Strategize, manage, and experience the thrill of football glory in a retro setting!

Experience the excitement of classic football in a modern era. Download Retro Bowl Classic today and relive the thrill of the gridiron with a touch of nostalgia! 🏈🎮
